tree.name: Ziaire Williams
tree.tradeDescription: Nets traded Mamadi Diakite and draft rights to Nemanja Dangubic to Grizzlies for Ziaire Williams and a 2030 DAL 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Mamadi Diakite

tradeChain.name: Ziaire Williams
